title.rendered: LAWS program celebrates its first graduate to attend law school

content.rendered: Alissa Saieva, class of 2017, is the first LAWS grad to attend law school.  Alissa joined LAWS while attending Central Technical School and she took every opportunity presented to her to immerse herself in law.  She is the first member of her family to attend postsecondary and has worked really hard towards all her achievements.
